title: Bitcoin Tully
blurb: UTXO timeline & provenance toolkit for coin age, flows, and spend classification.
description: Bitcoin Tully constructs per-UTXO timelines (“tally”), computing coin age distributions, dormancy flows, realized cap deltas, clustering-free path summaries, and spend classifications using transparent heuristics. Data adapters include Bitcoin Core RPC, Electrum, and Esplora-compatible endpoints. Outputs are tidy (Parquet/CSV/Arrow) for notebooks and dashboards. Privacy-first: no third-party labels, no heuristic deanonymization by default; all transformations are documented and reproducible.
